name: Memories (itch) (MaplePunkGJ, Zeusist, Fabian_Golz, MystaraCorvus)
description:
How to Play Shoot your paint projectiles to make the route to your most cherished memories visible before everything gets annihilated by the memory-fading Sphere. Use your secondary color projectile to save the memories you want to keep and protect them from the fading away after the Shpere will be gone. Move using standard WASD and Mouse controls, shoot your primary color with the right mouse button and shoot your secondary color with the left mouse button.

Used Diversifiers Universal, Time Sensitive, Clear View.

Team MaplePunk
Felix Schmidt, Programming, Game Design
Maximilian Santa, Game Design, Level Design, Sound
Eddie, Programming, Game Design
Antonio Bifulco, 2D/3D Art, Level Design
Fabian Golz, 3D Art
